title: Homestead National Monument of America: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Reservations Reservations are not needed for regular visits to the park or for special events (unless otherwise noted in the event description).  Bus Tour Groups While not required, bus tour groups are encouraged to make a reservation by calling 402-223-3514 prior to their visit to ensure that we can best accommodate the group's needs.Learn more about planning your tour group's visit.  School Group Field Trips Reserve a field trip for your school group with a variety of activities and ranger-led programs. Educational field trips must be scheduled at least two weeks in advance by calling 402-223-3514. Learn more about planning a field trip to Homestead.  Permits  Research Permits Homestead's environment is a great place to conduct research.Learn more about ongoing research projects and how to acquire a research permit.  Special Use Permits Special events, weddings, public assemblies, meetings, certain commercial photography, sale or distribution of printed matter and any other activities of organized groups require a written permit from the Superintendent. Learn more about obtaining a special use permit here.
